channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Justin Baldoni's Texts After Being Confronted by 'Angry Husband' Ryan Reynolds Revealed: 'They Are So Convinced It's Real'
item.description: "It's hard to feel so much of what they believe about me is false because they are so convinced that it's real," wrote Justin Baldoni
